name: Time Lock VR-2
description:
Mystical version of the Timelock VR Games series.

The player has to free the soul of the ancestor imprisoned by the sorcerer in a magic stone.
To solve riddles, you will need to move in time.
Be careful, at the time of moving something may go wrong.

In a dream, the player is his ancestor and asks to free his soul.
Find a place in which the element is hidden in which his soul is imprisoned.

Hurry to put everything into place.

Explore every corner in its path.

Be ready for an unexpected battle with dark forces!
